title: Build a Satellite Wiring Harness
description: A technician needs to build a complex wiring harness that connects the satellite's main computer to its various subsystems.

tasks.description: Follow the wiring diagram to cut, strip, and crimp pins onto all the necessary wires.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly prepares all wires according to the schematic.

tasks.description: Insert the pinned wires into the correct locations in the multi-pin connectors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the connectors with 100% accuracy.

tasks.description: Perform a continuity test on the completed harness to ensure there are no open circuits or short circuits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the test and confirms the harness passes all continuity checks.
